summary:
Claim Drop - The leading lending market on L2s

 ZERO Emissions Will Begin Soon - Metrics: Market Size - 155,000,000, Total Value Locked - 85,740,000, Unique Active Addresses - 350,000

 Introducing $ZERO - The governance and utility token that will be distributed through Zero Gravity, a points platform. $ZERO holders are eligible for future ecosystem points and incentives.

 Partners and Collaborations - A growing ecosystem of DApps to simplify the DeFi lending experience

 Step into the void with ZeroLend - Join ZeroLend as we revolutionize the lending experience on L2s
